sentences.en: " If you install more memory, you can use it fairly well. "
sentences.cn: 如果增加内存的话, 你的电脑就还可以用.

sentences.en: Easy to clean, maintain, install, cost effective yet attractive design.
sentences.cn: 易清洁 、 易保养 、 易安装, 既经济又美观.

sentences.en: He always say to install gas by man.
sentences.cn: 他总说叫人把煤气装上.

sentences.en: He's going to install an air - conditioner in the house.
sentences.cn: 他要在这屋子里装 空调机.

sentences.en: How to install FTP Server for File Transfer service?
sentences.cn: 如何安装FTP服务来提供文件传输服务?

sentences.en: I decided to install temporary SF, which made Victor nervous.
sentences.cn: 我决定安装临时的特种设备, 这使维克托感到紧张不安.

sentences.en: It was said that he went to great expense to install a lift in the building.
sentences.cn: 据说他花费巨资在大楼里安装了一台电梯。

sentences.en: It would cost about £3,000 to install a new heating system in a flat such as theirs.
sentences.cn: 在他们那样的一套公寓房里安装一套新的供暖系统可能要花费3,000英镑左右。

sentences.en: Security cameras have been installed in the city centre.
sentences.cn: 在市中心已安装了一些监控摄像机。

sentences.en: The shower is easy to install — it needs only to be connected up to the hot and cold water supply.
sentences.cn: 淋浴器很容易安装——只要接上冷热水就行。

sentences.en: The unit is comparatively easy to install and cheap to operate.
sentences.cn: 这种设备比较容易安装而且用起来便宜。

sentences.en: They will install a heating and lighting system in our house.
sentences.cn: 他们将在我们家装上供热供电系统.

sentences.en: They’ve installed the new computer network at last.
sentences.cn: 他们终于安装了新电脑网络。

sentences.en: To minimize the risk of burglary, install a good alarm system.
sentences.cn: 安装可靠的报警设备以减低被盗的风险.

sentences.en: Utility companies could install and maintain them.
sentences.cn: 公用事业公司可以安装并保养它们.

sentences.en: We remove these rear controls and install them as canard controls.
sentences.cn: 我们把尾部控制改为鸭式控制.

sentences.en: You think the average Storm Trooper knows how to install a toilet main?
sentences.cn: 你以为风暴骑兵大都知道怎样造厕所 啊 ?

words.tran_cn: 安装；分期付款；部分；就职
安装；安置（install的ing形式）；正式任命

trans.tran_en: to put a piece of equipment somewhere and connect it so that it is ready to be used

trans.tran_cn: 安装，安顿，安置，任命，使…正式就职
trans.tran_en: to put a piece of equipment somewhere and connect it so that it is ready to be used
